Les chansons de l'album {{ album.title }}

{{ song.title }}
import {Component, OnInit} from '@angular/core'; import {ActivatedRoute} from '@angular/router'; import {SpotifyService} from '../services/spotify.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-album', templateUrl: './album.component.html', styleUrls: ['./album.component.css'] }) export class AlbumComponent implements OnInit { album: any; songs: any[] = []; constructor(private route: ActivatedRoute, private spotifyService: SpotifyService) { } ngOnInit() { const id = this.route.snapshot.paramMap.get('id'); this.route.params.subscribe(params => { const id = +params['id']; if (!isNaN(id)) { this.spotifyService.getAlbum(id).subscribe((data: any) => { this.album = data; }); } }); } }
